review: I will start by saying that I am an Apple TV owner and this Stick blows the apple away Hands down. More  bang for your buck!  More apps things syncs with prime membership.  It's has changed the way I have and will watch tv.  Good job Amazon!  Keep it up!
author: Jonathan Kelly
